title: Hey Santa
description: She doesn’t want a lot for Christmas…Claire Otton dreads spending another holiday alone. When her best friend convinces her to approach the sexy mall Santa, she takes the chance and asks him out, hoping for so much more.He’s waiting under the mistletoe…Although Andreas Castellanos blends in on Earth, he knows he will never belong. But when the gorgeous woman he’d been staring at invites him to dinner, he has a hard time saying no.All they’re asking for…Can these two lonely souls find magic together or will their secrets steal their chance of a happy Christmas?
author: Jessica E. Subject
